'''Laura Baggins (n√©e Grubb)'''<ref name = "Letters>{{L|214}}</ref> was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
==History==
Laura was a sister of [[Lavender Grubb]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref> She married [[Mungo Baggins]] and among their children was [[Bilbo Baggins]]' father [[Bungo Baggins|Bungo]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

From {{TA|2900}} to {{TA|2916|n}} Laura Grubb was the official matriarch of the [[Baggins Family]].<ref name = "Letters></ref>

==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Laura (given name)|Laura]] is the female form of Latin ''laurus'' "bay, laurel tree".

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2003: [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]]:'''
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Laura, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my Gammer Laura. She was a Grubb before she married a Baggins".
